text: Area code 807 is a telephone area code in the North American Numbering Plan (NANP) serving the northwestern province of Ontario in Canada, including many remote and rural areas. It was established in 1962 when it was split from area code 705. It covers Thunder Bay, Kenora, Dryden, Fort Frances, Red Lake, and Sioux Lookout. Category:Area codes in Canada
title: Area code 807
